name: Asteroid Remake
description:
Asteroid Remake is a prototype game inspired by the old "Asteroid" Atari game.

The goal of the game is to survive for 5 minutes and destroy as many asteroids as you can.

This game is made in 24hour from scratch for a prototype portfolio.

Control :  Movement - WASD 

                   :  Shooting - left mouse click

                   : Escape - pause
